thumb.name: We're Thinking of You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJanet.%3Cbr%3E You're in %3Cbr%3E Our Hearts %3Cbr%3E and Minds%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAll of us are hoping%3Cbr%3Ethat this message will reveal%3Cbr%3EOur heartfelt understanding%3Cbr%3Eof the sorrow that you feel...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd may you find it comforting.%3Cbr%3Eat least in some small way.%3Cbr%3ETo know our thoughts%3Cbr%3Eare there with you%3Cbr%3Ein sympathy today.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Time of Loss
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn Your Time%3Cbr%3Eof Loss.%3Cbr%3EVicki%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAn expression%3Cbr%3Eof deepest sympathy%3Cbr%3Efrom AB Industries%3Cbr%3Eto you%3Cbr%3Eand your family.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: I've Been There. Too
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDavid.%3Cbr%3EI understand%3Cbr%3Ewhat you're going through.%3Cbr%3Ebecause I've experienced%3Cbr%3Ethe loss of someone%3Cbr%3Every dear in my life. too --%3Cbr%3Eand even though every person%3Cbr%3Ehas to get through a time like this%3Cbr%3Ein their own way.%3Cbr%3EI know you will come through.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESomeday.%3Cbr%3Ethe pain will ease%3Cbr%3Eand the memories%3Cbr%3Ewill bring comfort.%3Cbr%3Ejust as they did with me.%3Cbr%3EAnd soon%3Cbr%3Eyou'll find yourself%3Cbr%3Eback in the stream of things.%3Cbr%3EI know...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI've been there. too.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: May God Be with You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJordan.%3Cbr%3EWe're Asking God%3Cbr%3Eto Be with You Now%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EI will not%3Cbr%3Eleave you%3Cbr%3Ecomfortless:%3Cbr%3EI will%3Cbr%3Ecome%3Cbr%3Eto you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJohn 14:18%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you find comfort%3Cbr%3Ein God's words%3Cbr%3Eand in the knowledge%3Cbr%3Ethat others sympathize with you%3Cbr%3Ein your loss.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Deepest%3Cbr%3ESympathy

thumb.name: On the Loss of Your Father
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAlison.%3Cbr%3EIn ways big and small.%3Cbr%3Eyour father's life%3Cbr%3Echanged our world%3Cbr%3Eand left it a better place.%3Cbr%3Eand touched too many hearts%3Cbr%3Eto ever be forgotten.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you find comfort%3Cbr%3Ein knowing that many people%3Cbr%3Eshare your sadness.

thumb.name: On the Loss of Your Mother
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA smile.%3Cbr%3Ea touch.%3Cbr%3Ea gentle laugh%3Cbr%3Eremembered.%3Cbr%3Ea voice softly%3Cbr%3Ewhispered%3Cbr%3Ein the wind...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay the memories of your mother%3Cbr%3Eheld deep within your heart%3Cbr%3Ehelp to soothe your spirit at this time.

thumb.name: For Colleague
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom%3Cbr%3EYour Colleagues%3Cbr%3Eat Tri-Chem. Inc.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBecky %26#151;%3Cbr%3EPlease accept%3Cbr%3Eour sincere sympathy%3Cbr%3Ein the loss%3Cbr%3Eof your loved one.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: For a Sudden Loss
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETony.%3Cbr%3Ethere are no words%3Cbr%3Ethat can truly%3Cbr%3Eease the pain%3Cbr%3Eof a sudden loss%3Cbr%3Elike this...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...but if caring thoughts can help.%3Cbr%3Ethey are with you there right now.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Heartfelt Sympathy

thumb.name: Others Care and Pray
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Heartfelt Sympathy%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay it console you to know %3Cbr%3Eothers care.%3Cbr%3EThink of you warmly. %3Cbr%3Eand in every prayer.%3Cbr%3EAsk God to bless you %3Cbr%3Ewith courage to bear%3Cbr%3Ethe sorrow that now fills your heart.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: May God Sustain You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing God's Comfort for You%3Cbr%3Eand Your Family%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's difficult at such a time%3Cbr%3ETo know what words to say.%3Cbr%3EBut may God be with you always%3Cbr%3ETo sustain you day by day.%3Cbr%3E
